About us

Welcome to Bathroom Trade Hub - your trusted local partner for everything bathroom-related!

Proudly based in Weymouth, Dorset, we're more than just a supplier - we're part of the local community. From the stunning Jurassic Coast to the historic harbourside, our beautiful seaside town inspires everything we do: reliable service, friendly support, and a genuine commitment to customer satisfaction. 

With over 10 years of industry experience, we understand what it takes and we're here to make your job easier. Our mission is simple: helping the local trade by making access to essential products faster, easier, and more affordable.

We support local trade and DIYers across Dorset and the UK, offering a wide range of quality bathroom products at highly competitive prices - and we don't just match prices, we'll beat any genuine quote.

Need it fast? We offer FREE same-day delivery on in-stock products throughout Dorset on orders placed before 1pm (Monday-Friday, when you spend over £100 excl VAT), and our local warehouse is stocked ready for you to take away the very same day.

Whether you're refurbishing a home or taking on a big project, Bathroom Trade Hub is here to help you get it done. At the heart of Bathroom Trade Hub is our enthusiastic, knowledgeable team - always ready with expert advice, practical support, and a friendly face. We're passionate about keeping up with the times and embracing new technology and tools that make working with us even more seamless. 

We value trust and long term relationships with our customers - because when you succeed, so do we.

We invite you to visit Bathroom Trade Hub at our showroom, located at:

Unit A6, 83 Lynch Lane, Weymouth, DT3 5DN.

We look forward to welcoming you soon.
